comment: /**  * Evaluate the given value as an expression, if applicable.  * return the value as-is otherwise.  * @param value the value to check  * @param evalContext the evaluation context  * @return the resolved value (potentially the given value as-is)  * @throws BeansException if evaluation failed  */
code: /**  * Evaluate the given value as an expression, if applicable.  * return the value as-is otherwise.  * @param value the value to check  * @param evalContext the evaluation context  * @return the resolved value (potentially the given value as-is)  * @throws BeansException if evaluation failed  */ @Nullable Object evaluate(@Nullable String value, BeanExpressionContext evalContext) throws BeansException.
